data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><strong>Changing Views on Health Care<\/strong><\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.4408552985756202\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"63\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"5\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"2\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"1786\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"50\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Health care appears to be the number one item on Trump's and Congressional Republicans' agenda. The GOP has already taken steps to begin the process of rolling back the Affordable Care Act, and <a href=\"said Alan Cole, an economist with the Center for Federal Tax Policy at the Tax Foundation.\" target=\"_blank\">Trump has said he will fill in the blanks on repealing and replacing President Obama's signature law once his Health and Human Services Secretary, Georgia Representative Tom Price, is confirmed<\/a>. <\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.758819210418307\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"50\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"68\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"3\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"1849\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"51\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>In his 2000 book, <em>The America We Deserve<\/em>, Trump touted universal health care and laid out an ideology on the subject that, frankly, looks pretty un-Republican. On the campaign trail, he promised to \"take care of everyone.\" But his <a href=\"https://www.donaldjtrump.com/positions/healthcare-reform\" target=\"_blank\">campaign health care plan<\/a>, released in March, sang a different tune.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.005828472981428745\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"36\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"118\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"4\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"1899\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"52\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>While campaigning, the Trump camp outlined a seven-point plan for health care in America, including the repeal of Obamacare, the allowance of purchases of health insurance across state lines and block-grant Medicaid to states, among other things.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7333213679212578\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"46\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"154\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"5\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"1935\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"53\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"This strikes me as a mixture of what is mostly Republican orthodoxy...with a couple of oddball proposals,\" said Roger Feldman, professor of health policy and management at the University of Minnesota. One of the unique aspects of the plan: allowing consumers to re-import drugs from overseas.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.6322258991392204\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"45\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"200\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"6\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"1981\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"54\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>At a February town hall event hosted by CNN, Trump was critical of Obamacare, noting that \"rates are going up 25, 35, 45, 55 percent.\" He emphasized that he was not receiving campaign money from insurance or pharmaceutical companies \"so I can do what's right.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.5427350416331933\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"0\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"245\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"7\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2026\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"55\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><iframe src=\"//s.t.st/embed/13958121.html?preroll=false&mute=true\" width=\"384\" height=\"216\" frameborder=\"0\" scrolling=\"no\" allowfullscreen data-video-ref-id=\"0_qr7ez4qf\" data-video-id=\"13958121\" data-video-auto-play=\"false\" data-video-show-ads=\"false\" data-video-auto-mute=\"true\"> <\/iframe><\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.45835461443988024\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"47\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"245\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"8\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2026\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"56\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"I don't think [Trump's health care proposal] is based on economic analysis, I think it's based on channeling a populist dislike of insurance executives,\" said Feldman. \"If he really tried to do the things he said he would do the insurance industry would be in the crosshairs.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.22891473272581397\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"45\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"true\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"292\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"9\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2073\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"57\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>The ability for consumers to buy their health insurance in other states is perhaps the health-related proposal Trump discussed most on the campaign trail. The idea is not new -- such a bill was introduced in Congress a decade ago -- but it is impactful.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.8040286962527432\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"46\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"337\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"10\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2118\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"58\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>When pressed for detail on his plan at the February 25 Republican debate hosted by CNN, Trump focused on the state lines issue, repeating on a handful of occasions his proposal to get rid of \"the lines\" around each state \"so we can have real competition.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7543929886895975\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"37\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"383\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"11\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2164\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"59\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"You get rid of the lines, it brings in competition,\" he said. \"So, instead of having one insurance company taking care of New York, or Texas, you'll have many. They'll compete, and it'll be a beautiful thing.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.5029630021290896\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"58\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"420\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"12\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2201\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"60\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"I think it could be a potentially significant improvement in insurance,\" Feldman, who in 2011 co-authored a paper on consumer response to a national marketplace for individual health insurance, said. \"It would do that by allowing people to buy insurance in states with fewer regulations, and that would, in turn, cause a restructuring of the health insurance industry.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7594428085919174\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"31\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"478\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"13\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2259\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"61\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Based on a pre-Obamacare baseline, Feldman and other researchers concluded such a system would result in seven million more people being insured by opening up the insurance markets to more competition.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.8856789432717878\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"5\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"509\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"14\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2290\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"62\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Of course, not everyone agrees.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.2776739717774329\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"43\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"514\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"15\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2295\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"63\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"It doesn't actually achieve you much,\" said Matthews, pointing out that a policy in another state may not translate to access to the network of physicians and pre-negotiated prices locally-purchased policies often afford. \"It's not a bad idea, but it is no panacea.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.34995172151825293\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"4\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"557\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"16\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2338\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"64\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><strong>Too Tough on Trade?<\/strong><\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.09277745826447348\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"46\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"561\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"17\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2342\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"65\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Trump likes to talk trade. And while has said he is a \"free trader,\" he has also clarified he doesn't like the deals the U.S. has done, such as <a href=\"http://time.com/4051371/donald-trump-nafta/\" target=\"_blank\">NAFTA<\/a> and the <a href=\"https://www.rt.com/usa/257377-tpp-deal-trump-criticism/\" target=\"_blank\">Trans-Pacific Partnership<\/a>. The <em>Art of the Deal <\/em>author has promised to negotiate better agreements.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.18407245824508\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"47\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"607\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"18\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2388\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"66\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"One of the things that's often lost is that [Trump] has a strong business background, he understands how commerce works,\" said John Hudak, a fellow in governance studies at Washington, D.C.-based think tank the <strong>Brookings Institution<\/strong>.. \"He has more business training than any American president we've ever had.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.19137389786943326\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"7\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"654\" data-page-word-count-total=\"662\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"19\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"19\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2435\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"67\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><em>Check Out TheStreet's <a href=\"https://www.thestreet.com/story/13640057/1/the-donald-trump-stock-portfolio-15-investments-bullish-on-president-trump.html\" target=\"_blank\">Donald Trump Stock Portfolio<\/a>.<\/em><\/p> <div data-page-count=\"4\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-total-page-count=\"4\" data-article-fixed-placement=\"pageTop\"><\/div> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.43427112391167955\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"13\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"0\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"1\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2442\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"68\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>But the ramifications of some of Trump's proposals might be less than ideal.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.34369379281483137\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"36\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"13\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"2\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2455\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"69\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Take China, <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RDrfE9I8_hs\" target=\"_blank\">one of his top talking points<\/a>. He has proposed negotiating with the country to prevent it from manipulating its currency and keeping it too low for American manufacturers -- and workers -- from competing.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7545707236577696\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"61\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"49\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"3\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2491\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"70\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"The reality is that when China devalues its currency, the goods that they produce become cheaper, and as a result, while we may lose some manufacturing jobs, the rest of the population gets to buy things a lot cheaper than they would if the products were made [in the U.S.],\" said Busler. \"The jobs he would bring back are yesterday's jobs.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.0846961492147229\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"54\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"110\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"4\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2552\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"71\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>In November, Trump released <a href=\"https://www.donaldjtrump.com/positions/us-china-trade-reform\" target=\"_blank\">his full plan for U.S.-China trade reform<\/a>, in which he pledged to immediately declare it a \"currency manipulator,\" force it to uphold intellectual property laws and end its \"illegal export subsidies and lax labor and environmental standards,\" among other measures, in order to help American manufacturers -- and workers -- compete.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.02755271817255911\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"38\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"164\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"5\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2606\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"72\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>He has continued his aggressive rhetoric since the election, and the figures who will serve as top trade advisers in his adminitration -- Peter Navarro, Robert Lighthizer and Wilbur Ross -- signal a tough stance on China as well.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.6003968577459132\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"0\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"202\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"6\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2644\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"73\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><iframe src=\"//s.t.st/embed/13956683.html?preroll=false&mute=true\" width=\"384\" height=\"216\" frameborder=\"0\" scrolling=\"no\" allowfullscreen data-video-ref-id=\"0_rvlixkd9\" data-video-id=\"13956683\" data-video-auto-play=\"false\" data-video-show-ads=\"false\" data-video-auto-mute=\"true\"> <\/iframe><\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7596230262269623\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"46\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"202\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"7\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2644\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"74\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Trump has also pinpointed imposing tariffs on imported goods, for example, suggesting a 35% tax on automakers that manufacture cars in Mexico. Such a maneuver might bring jobs back stateside, but it might not. Instead, it could just mean people paying more for what they're buying.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.101428255437929\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"41\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"248\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"8\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2690\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"75\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"If he puts 35% taxes on products, the manufacturing will still not come back to the U.S., and all it will mean is U.S. consumers have to pay 35% more for the products that are made outside the country,\" said Busler.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7328036627401018\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"24\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"true\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"289\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"9\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2731\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"76\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"American consumers would end up paying more for things, and that hurts the economy if you're putting tariffs on those other things,\" said Matthews.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.5616851681890025\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"3\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"313\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"10\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2755\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"77\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><strong>The Trump Effect<\/strong><\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.6395485366736549\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"40\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"316\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"11\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2758\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"78\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>Trump's brand has contributed an enormous amount to his net worth -- <a href=\"http://www.thestreet.com/story/13188741/1/here-s-how-donald-trump-claims-to-be-worth-9-billion.html\" target=\"_blank\">he says more than $3 billion<\/a>. But how will that Trumpiness translate to the White House? Perhaps not well, especially if he keeps up with his Twitter habits.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.35219528958526536\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"72\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"356\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"12\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2798\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"79\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"That off-the-cuff, gruff, tell-it-like-it-is approach that Donald Trump has may be great for headlines and a stadium full for supporters, but what unguarded comments like that from a president do is make dramatic fluctuations in the world economy, in stock markets in the United States and in the world,\" said Hudak. \"Think about how much the market reaction is to the choice of two or three words from the Federal Reserve chairman.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.5559902318380319\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"52\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"428\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"13\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2870\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"80\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>The words chosen by American officials can have serious economic repercussions, and the country -- and the world -- have equally high expectations for their commercial and diplomatic capabilities. The blunt way of speaking that has made Trump so popular among Republican voters could be detrimental once he's in the Oval Office.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.38707820402951754\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"13\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"480\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"14\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2922\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"81\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"His brand of rhetoric would actually make for profound economic instability,\" Hudak said.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.97588121547368\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"12\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"493\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"15\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2935\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"82\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>He has already proven the ability to shake markets with a tweet.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.11401992528673599\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"27\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"505\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"16\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2947\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"83\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>But Trump is a smart guy, and he may be able to adjust. Matthews pointed to the Clinton administration, which took a few months to settle in.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.8213446378432033\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"23\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"532\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"17\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2974\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"84\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"You wonder if the Trump administration would be the same until they got things under control, or got him under control,\" he said.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.7958588198324981\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"15\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"555\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"18\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"2997\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"85\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>And some say Trump's style bodes well for the future of America and its economy.<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.1097980132091958\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"39\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"570\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"19\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"3012\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"86\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p>\"I think Donald Trump is good for the Republican Party, and I think he's good for the country,\" Busler said. \"Donald Trump is not afraid to face the public and raise his voice, even if it is politically unpopular.\"<\/p> <div id=\"div-placement-para-0.08698179096015812\" data-image-at-index=\"-1\" class=\"placement-para\" data-paragraph-word-count-total=\"7\" data-page-paragraph-middle=\"false\" data-page-word-count-so-far=\"609\" data-page-word-count-total=\"617\" data-page-paragraph-count-total=\"20\" data-page-paragraph-count-so-far=\"20\" data-article-word-count-so-far=\"3051\" data-article-word-count-total=\"3058\" data-article-paragraph-count-so-far=\"87\" data-article-paragraph-count-total=\"87\"><\/div><p><em>Check Out TheStreet's <a href=\"https://www.thestreet.com/story/13640057/1/the-donald-trump-stock-portfolio-15-investments-bullish-on-president-trump.html\" target=\"_blank\">Donald Trump Stock Portfolio<\/a>.<\/em><\/p> <div
